name: Prizm (Fury1012, Kaixvny, Roborg)
description:
MADE FOR MINI JAM 121

(The game does include heavy draw functions which may cause your game to LAG!)

Prizm is a short puzzle platformer made for mini jam 121, you have a limited window of view shown by a prism, which reveals color and unseen blocks. The game was inspired by the idea of shooting white light into a right triangle prism making a rainbow.

- Members -

Kaixvny - Coding and Level Design

 Roborg - Coding and Music

Fury1012 - Main Artist and Animator

Azzy - Logo Artist

- Contributors -

 Jakek128 - Main Menu Music

Software Used: GMS, Adobe Animate, Medibang Paint Pro, and FL Studio

We do have intentions of taking this project further after the jam, please send ideas! We will post updates on our Tiktok @PingedInc
